effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 874,826 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 410,468.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Become the pinnacle of Gallagio service excellence and dole out Kaja'Cola Mega-Lite to injured allies 10 times over 4 sec, healing them for 986,982 and increasing their Speed by 1,758 for 5 sec. The number of servings is increased by your Haste. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 331 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 51,014 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 115,947.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 924 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
